mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from bbs_t where bname = #{bname}
mapper.update: UPDATE bbs_t SET hit=hit+1 WHERE b_idx = #{b_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs_t (subject, writer, content, file_name, ori_name,write_date, ip, bname, status,hit) VALUES (#{subject},#{writer},#{content},#{file_name},#{ori_name},NOW(),#{ip},#{bname},0,0)
